entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fredericton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -25.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 07:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

Temperature: -25.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -28.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. High minus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
